summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to federal grant funds for technical training; authorizing execution of agreements with the Workforce Development Council of Seattle-King County for federal grant funds for the United States Department of Labor H-1B Technical Training Program; accepting funds; increasing expenditure allowances in the 2003 budget of the City's Department of Information Technology and Office of Economic Development by making reimbursable appropriations; creating a new position; authorizing execution of an agreement with the International Federation of Professional and Technical Engineers, Local 17 for Information Technology coaching; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
